home.title: A secure and responsive environment for communities, projects and ideas.

cookie.title: Hey, no running in the hallways!
cookie.msg: You must accept the usage of cookies to visit this website.
cookie.desc: Cookies (data stored locally on your device) are required for this website. Without those, the website cannot operate as intended, and worse, the cookie monster will be saddened.
cookie.reject: By rejecting all cookies you are also revoking your rights to the usage of this website.

img.fileErr: File does not contain an image!

stores.opt-in-d2: Add items to sell, manage your commissions and connect with your customers... all on wikiric.
stores.invDesc: Manage items/services you want to sell

inventory.noneHint: Add an item or service to get started!

commissions.btnReportDesc: By creating a report (below) a list of all items that need to be shipped can be generated.

checkout.scrollDown: Scroll down to fill out the shipping/billing address.
checkout.noBank: (No bank details available, please contact seller for an invoice!)

checkout.qrHint: If a QR code appears, simply scan it with any banking app.
checkout.demand2: to this bank account to get your item(s) shipped to you
